description: Mapping of translation keys to strings.

^[a-zA-Z]([a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)?$.description: Case sensitive translation key. May only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

base.description: Optional base locale from which all missing translations are automatically inherited. Must be in the format "ll-CC" (language-country), e.g. en-US.

langName.description: Name of the language in the language itself.

langNameEnglish.description: Name of the language and the country (or locale) in English in the format "Language (Country or Locale)".

countryName.description: Name of the country in the language itself.

authors.description: Name(s) of the author and contributors of the translation.

items.description: Name of the author or contributor.
